doctors.name: T. Colin Campbell
doctors.summary: American biochemist who specializes in the effect of nutrition on long-term health. He is the Jacob Gould Schurman Professor Emeritus of Nutritional Biochemistry at Cornell University.

doctors.name: Michael Greger
doctors.summary: American physician, author, and professional speaker on public health issues, particularly the benefits of a whole foods, plant-based, healthy diet and the harms of eating animal products.

doctors.name: Michael Klaper
doctors.summary: American physician, author, and veganism advocate

doctors.name: Terry Shintani
doctors.summary: American physician, attorney, nutritionist, professor, author, lecturer, radio show host and community advocate in Hawaii.

doctors.name: Gabriel Cousens
doctors.summary: Gabriel Cousens is an American physician M.D., homeopath, and spiritual writer who practices holistic medicine.

doctors.name: Herbert M. Shelton
doctors.summary: American naturopath, alternative medicine advocate, author, pacifist, vegetarian, and a supporter of rawism and fasting. Shelton was nominated by the American Vegetarian Party to run as its candidate for President of the United States in 1956.

doctors.name: Milton Mills
doctors.summary: Critical Care Physician, Inova Fairfax Hospital - Member of the Board of Directors, Plant-based Prevention Of Disease, Inc.

doctors.name: Kim A. Williams Sr.
doctors.summary: American cardiologist. He is a Fellow of the American College of Cardiology and served as its president 2015â€“2016. He is currently a trustee of the organization.

doctors.name: Dean Ornish
doctors.summary: American physician and researcher. He is the president and founder of the nonprofit Preventive Medicine Research Institute in Sausalito, California and a Clinical Professor of Medicine at the University of California, San Francisco.

doctors.name: Joel Kahn
doctors.summary: Dr. Kahn is a Clinical Professor of Medicine at Wayne State University School of Medicine and Director of Cardiac Wellness, Michigan Healthcare Professionals PC. He is a graduate Summa Cum Laude of the University of Michigan School of Medicine. He lectures widely on the cardiac benefits of vegan nutrition, mind body practices and heart attack prevention. He writes blogs for MindBodyGreen, OneGreenPlanet, Aloha.com, and Forksoverknives.com. He also writes for Readers Digest Magazine as the Holistic Heart Doc and his first book, The Whole Heart Solution.

doctors.name: Neal Barnard
doctors.summary: American author, clinical researcher, and founding president of the Physicians Committee for Responsible Medicine.
